title: [Health] Drinking several cups of coffee every day may be linked to a lower risk of developing prostate cancer. Each additional daily cup of the brew was associated with a reduction in relative risk of nearly 1%, the findings indicate.

[Neuroscience] Fragmented sleep patterns before stress exposure could predict future resilience to stress with up to 80 percent accuracy. Mice with "insomnia-like" patterns before social defeat testing, were less resilient to the stress than mice with regular sleep patterns.
